channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Power System S821LC Server (8001-12C)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Power System S821LC Server (8001-12C)

item.title: CVE-2021-29847|2024-08-03T22:18:03.362Z -- ibm -- power%20system%20s821lc%20server%20%288001-12c%29
item.description: BMC firmware (IBM Power System S821LC Server (8001-12C) OP825.50) configuration changed to allow an authenticated user to open an insecure communication channel which could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 205267.
